data.name: Control_Description
data.value: CompareSet PDF comparison engine for Power Apps

data.name: Prop_OldPdf_Desc
data.value: Base64 string containing the original PDF revision.

data.name: Prop_NewPdf_Desc
data.value: Base64 string containing the updated PDF revision.

data.name: Prop_Dpi_Desc
data.value: Rendering resolution used to detect differences (default 144).

data.name: Prop_GridRows_Desc
data.value: Number of rows in the logical grid used to label diff regions.

data.name: Prop_GridCols_Desc
data.value: Number of columns in the logical grid used to label diff regions.

data.name: Prop_DiffThreshold_Desc
data.value: Pixel intensity difference threshold (0-255) applied before morphology.

data.name: Prop_MinRegionArea_Desc
data.value: Minimum diff region size in pixels after scaling (default 64).

data.name: Prop_StrokeWidthPt_Desc
data.value: Overlay outline stroke width in PDF points.

data.name: Prop_OverlayAlpha_Desc
data.value: Overlay fill alpha (0-1) for diff rectangles.

data.name: Prop_ColorRemoved_Desc
data.value: Hex color applied to removed or modified areas on the old PDF page.

data.name: Prop_ColorAdded_Desc
data.value: Hex color applied to added or modified areas on the new PDF page.

data.name: Prop_RunCompare_Desc
data.value: Toggle to true to request a comparison run.

data.name: Prop_OutputPdf_Desc
data.value: Base64 string of the generated comparison PDF.

data.name: Prop_DiffSummary_Desc
data.value: JSON describing each diff region per page.

data.name: Prop_DiffCount_Desc
data.value: Total number of diff regions detected.
